A Very Conservative Projection
•
The following projection assumes the following:
•
Start with 100 Local dealers (Buyers) throughout the U.S. and grow
them to 600 in a 24-month period.
•
Start with 12 Large distributors
•
Assume the average sale is $132.00
•
The average buyer will do 16 - 30 transactions a month
•
Assume merchant fees go down .5% in month 7
•
Bring in advertising and Buyer’s subscription in month 13
